meanings.sent1: The acinose glands in the body help with digestion.

meanings.definition: Having small rounded or saclike structures.
meanings.sent1: The acinose berries were perfect for making jam.
meanings.sent2: The acinose bumps on the skin disappeared after treatment.
meanings.sent3: The acinose design of the purse made it easy to hold.
